reviewText: If you're looking for the most random movie assortment on one disc, here you go. My husband got this as a gag gift for my brother as an inside joke. While I don't fully get their humor, I did laugh at the cinematic collection. I have to believe this is a bootleg because the quality of the cover is not good and looks like it was printed on a really bad home printer. Further, I can't imagine any legit production company felt it was a good business movie to bundle these four particular movies together. I can't speak to the quality of the video because I doubt my brother has even opened the case, but I can't help but imagine it's not good either. Just a hunch.
